title.rendered: How many digits are in a UPC Code?

content.rendered:
A universal product code (UPC) is 12 digits, an EAN is 13 digits.  If you open the .csv and you don’t see all 12 digits, please adjust your viewing settings to ensure you sell all 12 digits and each code is unique.

Need codes?
